keel.Algorithms.ImbalancedClassification.ImbalancedAlgorithms.GP_COACH_H

Class CHC_Chromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.ImbalancedClassification.ImbalancedAlgorithms.GP_COACH_H.CHC_Chromosome
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class CHC_Chromosome
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable

    Title: CHC_RuleBase

    Description: Chromosome that represents a modified data base and rule base used in the CHC algorithm

    Company: KEEL

    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Written by Victoria Lopez (University of Granada) 14/06/2011

        Default constructor

      • CHC_Chromosome

        public CHC_Chromosome(CHC_Chromosome orig)
        Creates a CHC chromosome from another chromosome (copies a chromosome)
        Parameters:
        orig - Original chromosome that is going to be copied

      • CHC_Chromosome

        public CHC_Chromosome(int size_rule,
                      int size_tuning)
        Creates a random CHC_Chromosome of specified size
        Parameters:
        size_rule - Size of the new chromosome considering the number of rules in the rule base
        size_tuning - Size of the new chromosome considering the number fuzzy labels in the data base

      • CHC_Chromosome

        public CHC_Chromosome(int size_rules,
                      boolean value_rules,
                      int size_tuning,
                      double value_tuning)
        Creates a CHC_Chromosome of specified size with all its elements set to the specified value
        Parameters:
        size_rules - Size of the rule part of the new chromosome
        value_rules - Value that all elements of the rule part of the chromosome are going to have
        size_tuning - Size of the tuning part of the new chromosome
        value_tuning - Value that all elements of the tuning part of the chromosome are going to have

      • CHC_Chromosome

        public CHC_Chromosome(boolean[] data_rules,
                      double[] data_tuning)
        Creates a CHC chromosome from a boolean array representing a chromosome
        Parameters:
        data_rules - boolean array representing the rule part of a chromosome
        data_tuning - boolean array representing the tuning part of a chromosome

    • Method Detail

      • not_eval

        public boolean not_eval()
        Checks if the current chromosome has been evaluated or not.
        Returns:
        true, if this chromosome was evaluated previously; false, if it has never been evaluated

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate(myDataset dataset,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Rule> rule_population,
                     GP_COACH_H gp_coach_obj,
                     boolean has_low,
                     boolean has_high,
                     int labels_low,
                     int labels_high,
                     double alpha)
        Evaluates this chromosome, computing the fitness of the rule and the weight. It also initializes the token structure for the token competition computation
        Parameters:
        dataset - Training dataset used in this algorithm
        rule_population - Rule population that is selected by the CHC chromosome
        gp_coach_obj - GP-COACH-H object that we will use to train an element in the training set with our rules
        has_low - true, if the associated rule base contains low granularity rules; false otherwise
        has_high - true, if the associated rule base contains high granularity rules; false otherwise
        labels_low - Number of fuzzy labels in low granularity rules
        labels_high - Number of fuzzy labels in high granularity rules
        alpha - Alpha of the raw_fitness evaluation function

      • getFitness

        public double getFitness()
        Obtains the fitness associated to this CHC_Chromosome, its fitness measure
        Returns:
        the fitness associated to this CHC_Chromosome

      • hammingDistance

        public int hammingDistance(CHC_Chromosome ch_b,
                           int bitsgen)
        Obtains the Hamming distance between this and another chromosome
        Parameters:
        ch_b - Other chromosome that we want to compute the Hamming distance to
        bitsgen - Number of bits per gen in the gray codification
        Returns:
        the Hamming distance between this and another chromosome

      • createDescendants

        public java.util.ArrayList<CHC_Chromosome> createDescendants(CHC_Chromosome ch_b)
        Obtains a new pair of CHC_chromosome from this chromosome and another chromosome, swapping half the differing bits at random
        Parameters:
        ch_b - Other chromosome that we want to use to create another chromosome
        Returns:
        a new pair of CHC_chromosome from this chromosome and the given chromosome

      • obtainSelectedRules

        public boolean[] obtainSelectedRules()
        Obtains the selected rules of the rule base associated to the current chromosome
        Returns:
        boolean array codifying the selected rules of the rule base associated to the current chromosome

      • obtainLateralTuning

        public double[] obtainLateralTuning()
        Obtains the lateral tuning of the data base associated to the current chromosome
        Returns:
        real array codifying the lateral tuning of the data base associated to the current chromosome

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object aThat)
        Compares this object with the specified object for order, according to the fitness measure
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
